course.subject: ISOM
course.name: Financial Technology (FinTech)
course.description: This course provides an overview of the Financial Technology (FinTech) arena. Topics include the computing and digital technologies needed for FinTech, such as open source software, cloud computing, time series databases, block chain, PKI, mobile communication, social media networks, etc. There will be group discussions, case studies and presentations/write-ups on how FinTech implementation and ICT solutions are applied in various innovative business models and risk management in banking and finance, especially in quantitative finance, algorithmic trading and wealth management. We will also discuss the socio-economic impacts and the latest government regulations affecting FinTech. Graded P or F.
